statements: SELECT * FROM environmental_data WHERE data_id = 1;
SELECT sensor_type, carbon_emission_level FROM environmental_data WHERE location_id = 5;
SELECT data_time, sensor_type FROM environmental_data WHERE carbon_emission_level > 100;
SELECT * FROM environmental_data WHERE sensor_type = 'Temperature Sensor' ORDER BY data_time DESC;
SELECT location_id, sensor_type, carbon_emission_level FROM environmental_data WHERE data_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT * FROM environmental_data WHERE location_id = 1 ORDER BY data_time DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT sensor_type, AVG(carbon_emission_level) AS avg_emission FROM environmental_data GROUP BY sensor_type;
SELECT * FROM environmental_data WHERE carbon_emission_level > 100 ORDER BY data_time ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT location_id FROM environmental_data WHERE sensor_type = 'Temperature' ORDER BY location_id;
SELECT sensor_type, MAX(carbon_emission_level) AS max_emission FROM environmental_data GROUP BY sensor_type;
SELECT * FROM transportation_data WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT vehicle_id, vehicle_type FROM vehicle_info ORDER BY vehicle_type DESC;
SELECT * FROM transportation_data WHERE carbon_emissions > 100 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT location, carbon_emissions FROM transportation_data WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY carbon_emissions DESC;
SELECT vehicle_id, fuel_type FROM vehicle_info WHERE emissions_standard = 'Euro 6' LIMIT 5;
SELECT location, carbon_emissions FROM transportation_data WHERE carbon_emissions > 50 ORDER BY location DESC
SELECT * FROM vehicle_info WHERE fuel_type = 'Electric' AND emissions_standard = 'Euro 6'
SELECT id, location, carbon_emissions, timestamp FROM transportation_data WHERE location LIKE '%City%' ORDER BY timestamp ASC
SELECT vehicle_type, fuel_type, emissions_standard FROM vehicle_info WHERE vehicle_type = 'Car' ORDER BY vehicle_id ASC
SELECT id, location, carbon_emissions, timestamp FROM transportation_data WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30'
SELECT * FROM EnvironmentalData;
SELECT timestamp, temperature, humidity FROM EnvironmentalData WHERE humidity > 50;
SELECT route_name, distance FROM TransportationRoutes ORDER BY distance DESC;
SELECT * FROM Vehicles WHERE fuel_type = 'Diesel';
SELECT vehicle_type, fuel_capacity FROM Vehicles WHERE fuel_capacity >= 50 ORDER BY fuel_capacity ASC;
SELECT * FROM EnvironmentalData WHERE temperature > 25 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT sensor_id, AVG(temperature) AS avg_temp, AVG(humidity) AS avg_humidity FROM EnvironmentalData GROUP BY sensor_id HAVING avg_temp > 20 ORDER BY avg_humidity DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT sensor_id, MIN(temperature) AS min_temp, MAX(temperature) AS max_temp FROM EnvironmentalData WHERE humidity < 50 GROUP BY sensor_id ORDER BY sensor_id;
SELECT route_name, distance, carbon_emissions FROM TransportationRoutes WHERE carbon_emissions > 100 ORDER BY distance ASC;
SELECT vehicle_type, fuel_type, SUM(fuel_capacity) AS total_capacity FROM Vehicles GROUP BY vehicle_type HAVING total_capacity > 100 ORDER BY vehicle_type ASC;
SELECT * FROM environmental_data WHERE temperature > 25
SELECT id, location, humidity FROM environmental_data ORDER BY humidity DESC
SELECT station_name, capacity FROM monitoring_stations WHERE capacity >= 100 ORDER BY capacity ASC
SELECT * FROM emissions_report WHERE carbon_emission < 50
SELECT vehicle_type, fuel_type FROM vehicles WHERE emissions_rating > 4
SELECT * FROM environmental_data WHERE location = 'New York' ORDER BY temperature DESC, humidity ASC

SELECT station_name, location, COUNT(*) AS total_vehicles FROM monitoring_stations JOIN emissions_report ON monitoring_stations.station_id = emissions_report.vehicle_id GROUP BY station_name, location HAVING total_vehicles > 10
SELECT vehicle_type, fuel_type, emissions_rating FROM vehicles WHERE emissions_rating > 4.5 ORDER BY emissions_rating DESC
SELECT AVG(temperature) AS avg_temp, AVG(humidity) AS avg_humidity FROM environmental_data WHERE carbon_level < 0.5
SELECT * FROM emissions_report WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY report_date
SELECT * FROM carbon_emissions;
SELECT vehicle_id, emission_amount FROM carbon_emissions ORDER BY measurement_date DESC;
SELECT manufacturer, fuel_type FROM vehicles WHERE vehicle_type = 'SUV';
SELECT * FROM emissions_standards WHERE max_emission_limit < 50;
SELECT vehicle_id, COUNT(*) FROM emissions_history GROUP BY vehicle_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT * FROM carbon_emissions;
SELECT manufacturer, vehicle_type FROM vehicles ORDER BY manufacturer ASC;
SELECT description FROM emissions_standards WHERE max_emission_limit > 100;
SELECT vehicle_id, SUM(emission_amount) AS total_emissions FROM emissions_history GROUP BY vehicle_id;
SELECT * FROM vehicles_tracking WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND timestamp <= '2022-12-31';
